content: They're off to the castle... The Killers have announced details of a huge show at Cardiff Castle this summer – taking place only two days before their headline performance at Glastonbury.The Las Vegas rockers will grace the Welsh capital on June 28, marking their first return to the city in almost seven years. Tickets for the show will go on sale this Friday (March 29) at 9AM.An official release from the band also confirms that they’re currently in the studio working on the follow-up to 2017’s acclaimed ‘Wonderful Wonderful‘ – which means new music could arrive by the time that the UK shows roll around.They’ll also play a show at Belfast’s Ormeau Park on June 25 – joined by Lewis Capaldi. Tickets for that show also go on sale on Friday at 9am.This comes after Brandon Flowers previously teased that a new record can be expected in 2019.
